product_name: Mountain House Grilled Chicken Breasts and Mashed Potatoes - 2 Servings
long_description: Quick and tasty meal of grilled chicken breasts and mashed potatoes flavored with herbs and chives. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Grilled chicken is fully cooked and only needs boiling water--ready to eat in four minutes. Each meal requires only 1-1/2 cups of water for both meat and potatoes. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Quick and tasty meal of grilled chicken breasts and mashed potatoes flavored with herbs and chives.
